name: Global Beast Tamer: I Can See the Path of Evolution
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: After traveling through time, I got the weakest little snowball as my pet, which couldnâ€™t even evolve? Do I really have to be a waste for the rest of my life? Ding! The System lights up! What! I actually saw the hidden evolution route! Who said it was the weakest! Evolve! Ice Queen!
